description: The Sargasso Sea Commission was established pursuant to the Hamilton Declaration (March 2014).  The description of the Sargasso Sea Geographical "Area of Collaboration" in the Hamilton Declaration in Annex I is a description of the Sargasso Sea ecosystem, excluding the Exclusive Economic Zone (EEZ) and Territorial Sea around Bermuda.
name: CLME: Sargasso Sea Geographical Area of Collaboration
